quotes.quote: Follow your image as far as you can no matter how useless you think it is. Push yourself.
Follow your dreams and use your natural-born talents and skills to make this a better world for tomorrow.
Follow your heart and your mind will create.
Never follow your dreams. Follow your effort.
The wisest men follow their own direction.
Follow your heart's truth with no need for personal gain other than the feeling produced when doing what you truly love.
Follow that will and that way which experience confirms to be your own.
At every crossroad, follow your dream. It is courageous to let your heart lead the way.
Follow your dream as long as you live, do not lessen the time of following desire, for wasting time is an abomination of the spirit.
Follow your passions, follow your heart, and the things you need will come.
To be happy, follow the heart not the thoughts.
Follow your intuition, listening to your dreams, your inner voice to guide you.
Follow your own particular dreams. We are handed a life by peers, parents and society, you can do that or follow your own dreams. Life is short, be a dreamer but be a practical person.
Follow your most intense obsessions mercilessly.
Follow your heart because it always knows.
Follow love and it will flee, flee love and it will follow thee.
Follow your heart and make it your decision.
People appreciate and follow the person who can persuade them properly. Make that person you.
Your world will follow your idea about yourself.
Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness.
Follow your instincts. That's where true wisdom manifests itself.
Where the mind goes, everything follows.
Follow your own path, no matter what people say.
To Follow by faith alone is to follow blindly.
You can do anything as long as you don't stop believing. When it is meant to be, it will be. You just have to follow your heart.
Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.
You'll be much more successful if you follow your dreams and follow your passions.
Follow your honest convictions and be strong.
Follow your instincts and do not let other people's opinion of you become your opinion of yourself.
Let us follow the truth whither so ever it leads.
Follow your heart and you won't get lost.
It is important to keep your head up and follow what you believe is right.
Really try to follow what it is that you want to do and what your heart is telling you to do.
Don't follow a trend. Follow your heart.
Follow your passion and you'll be successful.
Don't follow your feeling. Just follow the word.
Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don't let anyone limit your dreams.
When it is not in our power to follow what is true, we ought to follow what is most probable.
Follow what you are genuinely passionate about and let that guide you to your destination.
When you follow your heart, you're never supposed to do things because of what you think people might say. You do it for the opposite reasons.
If you follow the lead of the artists, they will take you places that you could never go on your own.
You do have to follow your heart, otherwise you're living a false life.
